attributes.review: Bunker baby boy😢 🍼 wants an app🥺😔 he wants the validation💋💋 let’s not give him that✨🧚🏻‍♂️😌 Everyone makes mistakes🌸🍐💗this app is a perfect example of that🥰😝I would say try again ✨🤪 but this is an exception🧚🏻‍♂️✨✌🏻
attributes.title: I support Trump🎀✨🧚🏻‍♂️ getting out of the White House🖐🏻💝💋

attributes.review: Honestly I’ve never downloaded a worse app in my life. Absolutely horrible how bad it is. App Store should definitely reconsider having this app because it’s an insult to all other apps.
attributes.title: Worst functioning app

attributes.review: It restarts my phone and glitches to much. The phone gets to hot
attributes.title: It will freeze your phone and bring the overall life of your battery down

attributes.review:
I tried downloading this app a year ago and it downloaded just now. The things on here are EXTREMELY racist, sexist, homophobic and etc.
It has no respect for women, people of color, and the lgbtq+ community. Don’t download this.
attributes.title: This App is Fake

attributes.review: Thank you, President Trump ! This app was a great idea. I wonder how they will try to stifle us here ?
attributes.title: Not a scam

attributes.review: This app is absolutely a amazing!
attributes.title: Make the App Store great again

attributes.review: I get weird pop ups and spam all the time since installing this app. I also think it got into my banking app. I’ve had weird withdrawals for a week now.
attributes.title: Disappointing

attributes.review: This app is terrible it took forever to download it took 5 business days to download and when I did the sign in was glitching this need to be token off ASAP it’s horrible
attributes.title: Glitch

attributes.review: This app is absolutely atrocious. It took forever to download not only that but the content on it literally made me sick to my stomach. Like imagine giving to five star 🌟 rating to a man who put innocent children in cages. I mean come on.
Trump is extremely racist not only that but this app shows racist slurs is this really the type person you want in the office. Every thing that he said he would do while in office has yet to happen!
attributes.title: DO NOT VOTE TRUMP 2020
